name: La Belle Vie Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed at the La Belle Vie during my stay in Hanoi and had a great time. It is located right across the main street nearby West Lake and surrounded by many bars and restaurant. It is also a short walk to walking street and you should try 'Bun Oc' at Hoe Nhai street, that's good. The staff was very nice and heplful. Very good security as well. If you invite a guest to you room the security will chenk in with you guest leaves to assure all is well. Internewt is also avaiable in the lobby. The room are average size with average bathrooms. This is great inexpensive hotel and I will stay here again during my next trip on Hanoi
reviews.title: Tourist Accomodation

reviews.text: I stayed for 2 nights in the La Belle Vie Hotel during my trip to Hanoi. It has a great location for the people who want to enjoy the calm atmosphere of hotel far away from busy street and also it has good access to the city center which it would not take more than 15 min. The hotel is completely modern and the staff of hotel is very professional. The rooms are very clean and there is all kind of facilities in each room. The bathroom is very spacious and beautiful.
reviews.title: Quite location

reviews.text: With so many hotels to choose from in Hanoi, it can be a daunting task. La Belle Vie has a few good hotels in Hanoi will meet all your demand of quality and satisfaction. All rooms are very clean and the service is of a high standard. The hotel is close to the hustle and bustle of Hanoi, food stalls, shopping area, Tran Quoc Pagoda are all very close. I am writing to say how impressed I was by all the staff...Service, Medical and other professional, and how well I treated. The lady in this position (sorry, I forgot her name) was so kind and friendly and helpful. She gave me nearly one hour of her time and I very much appreciate that
reviews.title: Great option for professional care

reviews.text: This hotel in Hanoi is really nice for the price with a standard hotel room with one bed and couch. The room is clean, has a TV with various movie channels, nice restaurant, and good staff. The location is pretty good as well, its close to Quan Thanh Street and Westlake if your looking for that kind of action but it is far enough away so you don't have to feel like you are staying in the boring world. There is everything you need within a stones throw and that's pretty important when finding "base" hotel. So I would have to say this is a good budget locale when staying in Hanoi.
reviews.title: Quiet place

reviews.text: Whether you are in Hanoi for business or pleasure, if you are looking for the most comfortable and convenient hotel in the city. Located in one of the main sections of Hanoi, the hotel's close proximity to attractions such as West Lake, Old Quater... The hotel boasts a huge breakfast buffet which wide range of selection. The rooms themselves are reason enough to stay in this hotel. Because of their large size, you can easily spread out and feel at home. The hotel does a great job providing pretty much everything I want or need in the room.
reviews.title: The good hotel has to offer

reviews.text: Choosing Hanoi for the holiday was the best decision of mine. I had a great time there, especially in Hanoi.
reviews.title: Can’t be better than this

reviews.text: Joining tour with a group – La Belle Vie Hotel is a small but very comfortable and cozy hotel. Our room was in 5th floor, not too high, but with the big window in the room, you still can enjoy the fresh air and see the streets below. It’s not a too big room but large enough for me. I really likes this room because of its decoration and cleanliness. In the room you can have every necessary things for the best stay. They even provide free WIFI for me to keep updating the news while being far away from home. The best thing of this hotels is its location. It’s not in the city center, then you can have a nice sleep without being disturbed by the noise from the vehicles. But it also just takes you a short time to get to the city center by walking. The receptionists were so kind when they gave us a map and so many suggestions to help me to explore the city with all interesting places.
reviews.title: Impressive hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am totally eager to give the best mark for La Belle Vie Hotel!
reviews.title: Love this place!!!

reviews.text: Upon arrival you will notice how impressive this joint is. We managed to get a top floor room overlooking the City and the view is pretty impressive. The room decor is very comfy and homey and the balcony is an absolute. Big rooms huge beds and the shower was great. Free wifi with good speed. Location is pretty good your only 5 min away from the Old Quarter. For the price I would say this is a great hotel with many perks that you wouldn't expect, great for families or singles looking for a good time in Hanoi!
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text: It's easy to find this hotel in Hanoi. They were very courteous at the front desk each time we needed something. As soon as we arrived they upgraded us to a higher level suite. It was quite amazing, private balconies. It had a huge King sized bed in the bedroom, the living room was quite comfortable even for being a leather couch and even a small room and desk built in for a laptop if you need to work or keep in contact with my family via the free internet. The bathroom was huge with one of those shower heads that come directly out of the ceiling. Its distance though makes for a peaceful night of sleep since you are indeed away from the noisy in walking street. So it has its benefits as well
reviews.title: Serves its purpose

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Confortable stay in a not easy city. The location as well hotel services were excellent with an always helpfull staff. Totally recomendable for all kind of turistas ((younger ones and/or elder ones) restaurant's quality of food as well prices were totally acceptable.
reviews.title: Visit to Hanoi

reviews.text: Stayed one night on the way back from Halong Bay, the hotel room and bathroom are clean , airco working and people very nice. Breakfast on low side, specially if you expect a western buffet but try Pho like locals
reviews.title: Good price for value in Hanoi
Good value in Hanoi
reviews.text: Easy to visit old quarter and walking around

We stayed 2 nights at La Belle Vie hotel and it was as great as I expected. I got an excellent service, just like at a five star hotel, but at an affordable price. It was just so amazing. The location was so convenient; it allowed us to go around Hanoi easily. The receptionists were always available for help and they were very nice to us. The room with bathtub was spacious, clean and contained all the necessary things. The breakfast (included in room rate) was freshly prepared and really tasty. It was really worth what I paid. I strongly recommend this hotel for your stay.
reviews.title: Modern with great facilites and location

reviews.text: Modern spacious and clean rooms with fabulous ensuites with multi function showers - so good for the price. The location has to be its best selling point as so much is within an easy walk.Visiting in the spring it was quite cool and a little rain but the rooms remained as warm as the hotel staff, with crisp clean linen and warm duvets.
reviews.title: Had a relaxing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very enjoyable experience, cannot expect more from a 3 star hotel. Rooms were very nice and staff were friendly. Walking distance or short taxi ride from most attractions. A bit noisy at night but this is to be expected with Hanoi. Great value for money and I would certainly recommend this hotel for anybody looking for a comfortable and reasonably priced hotel.
reviews.title: Good, clean hotel

reviews.text: Located just out of the chaos of the old quarter and a short walk from the beautiful Truc Bach Lake, La Belle Vie ticked all the boxes for us. We booked as part of an airline package so we can't comment about the cost but our rooms were spacious comfortable and clean and the staff, despite a few language related minor misunderstandings were friendly and eager to be of assistance. Breakfast in the dinky little downstairs dining room was very good with plenty of choices including excellent pho, cold buffet and an egg chef. In short a comfortable base from which to explore the city.
reviews.title: comfortable hotel, great choice

reviews.text: A great place to stay in Hanoi, lovely modern and very contemporary furnished and decorated rooms, stunning city all round views from our room at the very top of the hotel. Superb and very spacious bathroom and great selection of toiletries. Breakfast was superb too with a huge choice of both hot and cold food. A small criticism is that the breakfast/dining room is small for the size of the hotel and if hotel is busy as it was when we stayed you may have to wait for a table for breakfast. Also if you are at top of hotel like us you might have to wait a while especially when lots of people are checking out in mornings and using lift for luggage. Staff were so friendly and nothing was too much trouble for them. Location of hotel in old quarter was perfect and handy for all the main sightseeing we planned on doing.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel & Staff

reviews.text: A very comfortable hotel located on the northern fringe of the old quarter. The rooms were of an adequate size, contained all the necessary toiletries and had a basic mini bar. The staff were courteous and helpful. Thank you for everything...
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: La Belle Vie is a set in a good location, just 5 minutes from West Lake and the Truc Bach area where there is plenty going on.
reviews.title: Good Location, Clean and Friendly

description: LA BELLE VIE is a boutique hotel, located in Nguyen Truong To Street and just few steps away from the old quarter and in walking distance to West Lake, convenient for any visitof this historic part of Hanoi. 35 minutes from Noi Bai International Airport. Close to City Centre in Hanoi and it's just moments away from the major entertainment.
